statements: DELETE FROM parts_inventory WHERE part_category = 'Electronics' AND part_quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM parts WHERE part_id = 100 AND price < 50.00;
DELETE FROM Components WHERE part_id = 5 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM Components WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM Components WHERE quantity < 10);
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE warehouse_id = 2 AND part_id = 3;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE warehouse_id = 1 AND part_id = 100;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE quantity < 5 AND transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
